Row.Text: Well met! Apologies for the furnishings around here, I had to get rid of most of the gaudy furniture and gilded statues in order to actually run my country - not everyone has the fortitute to put aside such pleasures for a stable realm and a glorious future. Nice crown, by the way.

Interesting - I'd been wondering if stupidity, a general disregard for human life and the kind of recklessness that only comes with ignorance could work together as a cohesive military tactic. This defeat has proved that, yes, it can. Enjoy your 'victory'.

Huh? Sorry, I was just thinking about the bloodstains on my good uniform - since it also just doesn't go away nomatter what I say or do. Not sure why I thought about that just now, its... good... to see you.
Only a complete idiot would give this proposition over a second's consideration. How many weeks did you work on it?
Ah, yes, you're here! There's a terrible stain on some of my sheets, so if you tackle those fir- oh, you're another king? Really? That's... interesting. Have we met before?
Ah yes, I remember who you are! You never quite forget a face as... unique... as your own. War can inflict some terrible wounds, I understand.
Hmm? Oh, yes, I suppose I can spare a minute for you. Lets talk and walk though, I'm fairly busy.
